english: like; as; if; in accordance with

etymology.description: phonetic: 女 + semantic: 口; also interpreted ideographically as a woman obeying an order.
etymology.interpretation: 女 serves as the phonetic, contributing the rú reading, while 口 evokes speech, orders, or saying, aligning with senses like “as; in accordance with.” Some traditions read it ideographically as a woman responding to a spoken instruction, extending to meanings of conformity or conditionality (“if”).

examples.chinese: 如果下雨(如果下雨)，我们就不去爬山(我們就不去爬山)。
examples.pinyin: Rúguǒ xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù páshān.
examples.english: If it rains, we won't go hiking.

examples.chinese: 她说话一如既往地温和(她說話一如既往地溫和)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shuōhuà yī rú jì wǎng de wēnhé.
examples.english: She speaks as gently as always.

examples.chinese: 如有问题(如有問題)，请联系我(請聯繫我)。
examples.pinyin: Rú yǒu wèntí, qǐng liánxì wǒ.
examples.english: If you have any questions, please contact me.
